content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Cortar en rodajas':

content.stimulus_en: I (be) ________ cooking dinner now.
First, (chop) ________ the onions.
Have you ________ (try) this recipe?
You (need) ________ three eggs for this cake.
Don't (add) ________ too much salt.
He (not/like) ________ spicy food.
This recipe is very easy to follow.
Chop vegetables the into small pieces.
The cake smells delicious in the oven.
I baked prefer potatoes to fried ones.
Boil the water before adding the pasta.
Stir soup the every few minutes.
